it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position

Class TowerPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position.Position
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.position.TowerPosition

  • public class TowerPosition
extends Position
    Implementation for the tower position, has a card that have to be setted in every round. The player can take the card if he place the familiar in the position (many checks have to be done before)
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
